title: Celluloid college: basic motion picture technique
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography - Lighting
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Amateur motion pictures
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
description: An instructional film for amateur movie makers; includes demonstrations and explanations of panning, using the tripod; shot break down; screen direction; matching; newsreel shooting; build-up; composition; indoor lighting. Concludes by presenting an amusing short play in which all the techniques emphasized in the film are incorporated.
